content:
@Joshua Procious
Tony created a "how to" article for this a while back : http://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=20021425
Tony actually pointed me to that and I included it on the main page of the PSS creation page tree. Apologies, I forgot to tell you I put it there.
@Lorraine Constable just now reindexed and the space permission with co-chairs is cleared up
